title: Full Stack HelpDesk Application
description: The application is a full-stack Helpdesk app that leverages Java Spring Boot for the backend and ReactJS ( Vite ) for the frontend. The app includes features such as user authentication, which allows users to create accounts and log in to access personalized features. The backend manages the data persistence with a database system, handling CRUD operations for movie data, user profiles, and user-specific data...

The backend manages the data persistence with a database system, handling CRUD operations for movie data, user profiles, and user-specific data....

title: ReactJS Deployment
description: Publishing ReactJS project on a VPS server using Ubuntu and NGINX is a quick way to make  project accessible on the internet. You need compile ReactJS Vite project and create static files after transfer these files to the server and set NGINX as a reverse proxy to correctly route incoming requests. NGINX serves these files quickly, allowing users to access project seamlessly

title: NextJS  Deployment

NGINX serves these files quickly, allowing users to access project seamlessly
